data.text: Set not thy heart upon thy goods;
Follow not thine own mind and thy strength,
And say not, Who shall have dominion over me?
Say not, I sinned, and what happened unto me?
Concerning atonement, be not without fear,
And say not, His compassion is great;
Make no tarrying to turn to the Lord;
Set not thine heart upon unrighteous gains:
Be swift to hear; The remainder of this line is omitted by the best authorities.
If thou hast understanding, answer thy neighbour;
Glory and dishonour is in talk:
In a great matter and in a small, be not ignorant;
